On this page

# Interface: PriceScaleMargins

Defines margins of the price scale.

## Properties[​](PriceScaleMargins.html#properties "Direct link to Properties"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Properties"} {#properties .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

### top[​](PriceScaleMargins.html#top "Direct link to top"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to top"} {#top .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

> **top**: `number`

Top margin in percentages. Must be greater or equal to 0 and less than
1.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### bottom[​](PriceScaleMargins.html#bottom "Direct link to bottom"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to bottom"} {#bottom .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

> **bottom**: `number`

Bottom margin in percentages. Must be greater or equal to 0 and less
than 1.
